name.full: Alex - Strap a Rocket to Your Back

description.short: Strap a rocket to your back. 100+ skills. Memory that persists. Open source.

You don't need another chatbot. You need thrust.

Alex is the propulsion system that compounds your velocity across M365. Memory that persists. Knowledge that grows. A rocket strapped to your back.
